title: Chocolate Orange Muffins
ingredients: ['250g plain flour', '110g plain chocolate, grated', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '90g butter or margarine, softened', '150g caster sugar', '2 eggs', '1 tablespoon orange zest', '60ml orange juice', '110ml buttermilk']
